top_categories.workout_context: 56ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Salty Lizard's Utah desert, Desert gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 50 miles.
At Salty Lizard, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Salty Lizard. Train it until it feels boring.
When someone attacks on Utah desert gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Salty Lizard's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
50 miles on Utah desert gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Varied gradients on Utah desert gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Base fitness for Salty Lizard. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Salty Lizard, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Torque for headwinds and Utah desert gravel. When cadence drops below 70rpm, muscular strength keeps the watts up.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Salty Lizard’s 50 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Salty Lizard. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Salty Lizard requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on utah desert gravel to build confidence. Expect: utah desert, desert gravel, high altitude.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 50 miles of utah desert gravel in Wendover, UT.
